Articles.Content:
For the lack of any remaining serious project, I decided to muck around a bit and work on my truss caging chops.

Kind of at a loss of a real goal, now that I found the limit of the parts tree. So now I'm just putting random things together and making it launch. Anyone got a craft file of something that shakes apart and won't launch? Send me a challenge. Stock only, please, or kethane at the most. Nothing clipped, for that matter. Anything that requires a cheating alpaca to put together is pretty much verboten.
I'm currently making an aquatic base on Laythe. I challenge you to make a massive floating base on Laythe!
Honestly, I don't think I've ever even been to Laythe. That's in the Jool system, right? Haven't been there.

Honestly, I don't think I've ever even been to Laythe. That's in the Jool system, right? Haven't been there.

Really? O_o

At your level I thought you would have nuked Eeloo with one of your mammoth crafts while laughing manically at your evil genius.

Nope. Let's see... if been to Kerbin, of course, the Mun, Minmus, Duna, Ike, Eve, and that rock around it. Gilly? That's about it. The main thing that grabs me with this game is the construction, not so much the sightseeing and travel. I spend more time building than I do flying.

... though I admit it might be interesting to put a giant deepsea oil rig on Laythe.
For a challenge, build a ship that can launch from Kerbin, land on Tylo, launch from Tylo, and then do a powered landing back at Kerbin. With 100T of dead-weight payload. (for science)

Well then, I propose you do a tour of the entire Jool system in that ever-maniacal way you do things around here. A Whackjovian Jool mothership will no doubt be very impressive, and trust me, a mission to all of Jool's moons is very rewarding

Maybe drop your deep-sea Laythe rig off as part of the mission? That would be epic. And huge.

Just a proposal, but I'm sure the construction aspect would be interesting to you.
Only been to Eve and never landed on it. That's about it.
Whackjovian Ascent vehicle built into a rover capable of taking off from eve and climbing a 20o hill.
EVERY TIME I go on a thread by Whackjob is "oh god what has he done now...??"

I know you said no mods, but hear me out.

I would be interested to see what you can make with Infernal / Damned / some other robotics pack. Giant spider? Jaeger? Mecha-Kraken? One of these surely sounds cool.

Nope. Let's see... if been to Kerbin, of course, the Mun, Minmus, Duna, Ike, Eve, and that rock around it. Gilly? That's about it. The main thing that grabs me with this game is the construction, not so much the sightseeing and travel. I spend more time building than I do flying.

... though I admit it might be interesting to put a giant deepsea oil rig on Laythe.

Go to Laythe, it is simply beautiful as can be, especially from the surface.

You must.
